title: Spectral Gastropod
summaries: The Gastropod is a flying Hardmode slime that spawns frequently at the surface of The Hallow at night, and fires high-velocity Pink Lasers which emit faint pink light if the player is within its line of sight.

The [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version also feature the exclusive Spectral Gastropod variant. The Spectral Gastropod fires a Pink Laser, similar to that of the regular Gastropod.
Like most other slimes, the Gastropod will be passive towards any player with the Royal Gel(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) accessory equipped.
